{{ myPic.id }} {{ myPic.alt }} {{ myPic.url }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { range } from 'rxjs'; import { PictureService } from 'src/app/services/picture.service'; import { Picture } from 'src/app/shared/models/Pictures'; @Component({ selector: 'app-picture-page', templateUrl: './picture-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./picture-page.component.css'] }) export class PicturePageComponent implements OnInit{ pictures!: Picture[]; constructor(private pictureService:PictureService){ } ngOnInit(){ var pictueSet=[this.pictureService.findAll().subscribe(data =>{ this.pictures=data; })]; let myPic= pictueSet[Math.floor(Math.random()*pictueSet.length)] return myPic; } }
